name: meteor-mash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise ATTACK.
flavor_text.emerald: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise ATTACK.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The foe is hit with a hard, fast punch. It may also raise the user’s ATTACK.
